name: Elixir (ThomasJohnGorham)
description:
Escape Elixir Corp is a 4 way shooter where you play a scientist trying to escape from an evil pharmaceutical company.

Shoot zombies, pickup dangerous chemicals and trade them for sweet items (the sweet items are things that appear in the show ELIXIR by Head First Acrobats)

You can check out head first acrobats here www.headfirstacrobats.com or on the socials www.facebook.com/headfirstacrobats
